name: Dodgeit
body:
### DodgeIt
This magnificent and awesome game was created as a web-project at the [University of Applied Sciences Hagenberg](http://www-en.fh-ooe.at/hagenberg-campus). The images were created with a high end image editing tool called [Gimp](http://www.gimp.org). The original images were downloaded from a small and rarely known search engine called [Google](https://www.google.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
